channel.title: Odd/annoying messages?
channel.description:
well for the first few mins after booting up I get "could not find mime type
application/octet-stream" and after I click OK, then the application works..
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 25, 2008, 09:40:09 PM[/size][hr]OK this is REALLY annoying it happens whenever I open ANY program, and today when I used the KDE find tool, it came up with like 20 of them :( [br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 27, 2008, 02:50:43 PM[/size][hr]Nothing as changed, It however cripples a program temporarily while changing the directory the program is paying attention to..

item.title: Odd/annoying messages?
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

I’ve already solved it, there was a junk file in the kde mime folder
I got some help on kubuntu IRC, but when I posted on how I fixed it the forum was down.

Read full topic

item.title: Odd/annoying messages?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Have you tryed google: http://www.google.com/search?client=opera&rls=nb&q=could+not+find+mime+type+application/octet-stream&sourceid=opera&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8

Read full topic
